Introduction
This topic contains information on final expense deductions, including
general information on final expenses
definition of last illness
burial expenses
just debts of the Veteran
example 1 of just debts
example 2 of just debts
, and
final expenses paid by a surviving spouse prior to the date of pension entitlement
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section K - Other Deductible Expenses
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section K
